Note:
CURRENT WEAPON (32-bit)
Sliding Stones = 0xc24c0006
Exploding Stones = 0x55440007
Boomerangs = 0xc2700006

HARRY JR. LIFE HUD (8-bit)
Looking at back = 0x0a then 0x0b
Looking at forward = 0x00

LETTERS (8-bit)
PITFALL letters amount
bit0 = P
bit1 = I
bit2 = T
bit3 = F
bit4 = A
bit5 = L
bit6 = L
bit7 = None

total = 0x7f

CHEAT CODES (8-bit)
Increase the value on memory
Select Stage = +0x04
Unlimited Continues = +0x08
99x Weapon = +0x10
9 Lives = +0x20
Super Speed = +0x40
Start on lvl6 = +0x80

HARRY JR. HORIZONTAL FLIP (8-bit)
right = 0x00 
left = 0xff

HARRY JR. HP (8-bit)
full life = 0x00
death = 0x96 (normal)
death = 0x64 (hard)

HARRY JR. WAS HIT (8-bit)
hurt box off = invincibility

STAGE ID (8-bit)
0xbc (EU) 0x4c (USA) = Ceiba Jungle
0xc0 (EU) 0x50 (USA) = Xibalba Falls
0xc4 (EU) 0x54 (USA) = Tazamul Mines
0xc8 (EU) 0x58 (USA) = Lost City of Copan
0xcc (EU) 0x5c (USA) = Copan Temple
0xd0 (EU) 0x60 (USA) = Lakamul Rainforest
0xd4 (EU) 0x64 (USA) = Yaxchilan Lagoon
0xd8 (EU) 0x68 (USA) = Runaway Minecar
0xdc (EU) 0x6c (USA) = Tikal Ruins
0xe0 (EU) 0x70 (USA) = Temple of Tikal
0xe4 (EU) 0x74 (USA) = Warrior Spirit
0xe8 (EU) 0x78 (USA) = Ending

POINTS (16-bit)
When points reach max (0xffff) is added +0x01 on POINTS ACCUMULATOR memory.
